text: 🚨 27% of Adults Face At Least One Healthcare Affordability Challenge 💸🤕New study shows that healthcare financial strain is affecting more than a quarter of non-senior adults in the US. This includes high out-of-pocket costs, medical debt, and forgone care. 💔The study also found that 46% of adults face financial strain when considering delayed care. 🤷‍♂️This is a clear call to action for policymakers to address the affordability crisis in healthcare. 🗳️👀#HealthcareAffordability
